website_summaries.verdict: The Anker Zolo Liberty Plus can be a very good totally wireless headphone, but it won't fit some people's ears -- and that's a problem.
pros: The Zolo Liberty are totally wireless earphones that offer a strong feature set and good sound at their price point
They're sweatproof and include a charging case that delivers twice as much battery life as the AirPods charging case
cons: May not fit some people's ears securely
If you can't get a secure fit, sound will suffer badly
Cost almost as much as the AirPods

customer_reviews.title: For listening to music on the move
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a totally wireless Bluetooth earbud with great sound and decent battery life that wouldn’t drop out every five minutes. Check, check, check, check. Why you would use this product for anything other than listening to music on the go is beyond me. Likewise, it’s not a fashion accessory, it’s an earbud. Great fit once you go through all the permutations of tips and jackets. Charging and pairing was effortless with iOS. The app is basic and barely worth the effort to download.
customer_reviews.author: Bushido

customer_reviews.title: Item appears to be used instead of new. Charging case is not working properly.
customer_reviews.text: I received a used one which they refused to refund without having to return the item or even send a replacement for free. I was gonna travel with these, but that didn't happen. I couldn't use them for the purpose of why I bought them in the first place. Some people value their time, I'm one of those people. The charging case wasn't working properly either, as I can't tell if it really did charge after 5 hours because there's only 2 LED working.
customer_reviews.author: Amaborn

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: These are now my go to earbuds for anytime I need to listen to anything. I use them outside and inside all the time, the battery life is extraordinary, and the battery case also has an amazing battery life. Very minimal issues every so often, but still 100% worth getting. I think they look and sound nicer than airpods. These earbuds have replaced all of my wired earbuds, just because they're so much more liberating. It feels so much nicer without wires. If you're worried about loosing them, put the earbuds back in the case, and keep the case in your purse, pocket, or anywhere you won't loose it.
customer_reviews.author: XTheUnwanted1

customer_reviews.title: Great For Wieghtlifting and Running
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Completely Wireless Good Sound Long Range Good Connection Little to No audio Sync issues on videos Cons: (these two things are the things that took a star away) The controls for changing songs suck No volume control sucks Side Note: I have had these for a couple months at the time of this review and have put them through the ringer. Every lift session (4 days a week) and every run session (5 days a week) and have not experienced the connection issues that some people have been talking about. Phone: Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brand

customer_reviews.title: Wanna go truly wireless on Android? here you go.
customer_reviews.text: I listen to music 20 minutes at a time, 2 times a day, so the battery seems to last months for me. The Bluetooth connection is spot on and pairs quick enough. The mic pass through feature is useful to pick up environmental noise like cars and conversations at lower media volumes. Once the music is pass 50% volume voices are harder to make out, but environmental noise is discernable. There is no physical volume controls. Changing the volume relies on using the assistant on the phone. Most of the other issues stem from Android's Bluetooth implementation. A good truly wireless headset.
customer_reviews.author: DWXDX

customer_reviews.title: Would I buy again? I already did.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the Kickstarter campaign, and was happy with them. I took them out once and put them on the end table instead of in their case and my dog attempted to eat one of the ear buds. I bought a new pair to replace. I've had other bluetooth earbuds, but they always had a wire. As a commuter who has a large head, the wire always seemed to be right where I didn't want it. Also, riding trains with a 2m cord tethering your ears to your phone had gotten old years ago. So would I buy again? I already did.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: STOP, Do not buy these; will stop working sooner, rather than later.
customer_reviews.text: So these are my second pair of zolo headphones; I purchased the cheaper liberty set a year ago, and wanted another pair (but better?) They sound great, but the problem is, after a week the left earbud will no longer work. It won't charge, it won't light up. If you take a minute or two do a search, you'll note that this is a persistent problem with the headphones. I have in fact, tried every single method to reset, repair, short. The awful thing is, this happened to my original pair I ordered last month, and again for the replacement set. They seriously need to figure out the hardware issues.
customer_reviews.author: dryice

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect - and perfection may be attainable.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few months now. Overall I really like them. The battery life is great. And the combined battery life of the Earphones + the case is fantastic! Only thing stopping this from being a 5 star review is the seal on the earphones. I have trouble keeping the seal. When they were brand new it seemed like it was better than it is now. And while they seem clean, maybe I should clean the tips a little better than I have. Just not sure. I tried some Comply foam tips instead, they were even worse. So I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ear buds just wish they lasted longer. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are really good earphones, Great sound and fit. I've had them for around 6 months and everything was great until all of a sudden the earphones just stopped working. For the price I imagine it would last longer but sadly I'm gonna have to go back to my old Anker ear buds until I can find out what went wrong. In the end it has amazing sound and decent battery life just that you expect them to last longer. Edit- The Anker team got in touch with me and made sure I got a new pair. Great customer service as always.
customer_reviews.author: David Magallanez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit, and less expensive than earpods
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this review as short as I can. I bought the apple earpods and they felt so strange in my ears and had the odd posts pointing down. So, I looked around at reviews for best earpods for the money and found the Zolo Liberty+ Total Wireless Earphones. I am completely impressed. They fit the ears well and have plenty of grip fit jackets and ear tips. Also, the case is a charging case for when you go on trips. The sound is terrific. I have large hands so I haven't really used the sound adjustments. Phone calls are clear. Overall, a total winner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps a step up but with less of a secure fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have used both the Libery and LIberty +. Here I will quickly list the pros/cons and the reason I perefer the original Liberty. PROS: Earphone case has a more premium metal feel. I expreienced no substancial connection drops. CONS: I experienced audio synchronization issues with my phone even after troubleshooting. The biggest issue for me is the company decided to change the "earstrap sizes." Zolo Liberty had the right lengths to stay fastened to my ear during any activity. Zolo Liberty + doesn't. The decreased earstrap sizes I feel are a problem that can't really be fixed because any 3rd party "straps" will most likely effect how the earphone charges (the charging area is a tight space).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Music, not phone calls.
customer_reviews.text: Great music sound quality, phone calls are basically a waste of time. You start feeling like you're doing a lil John impression. "WHAT?" "YEAH!" "WHAT?!" "OKAY?!"
customer_reviews.author: Mk90

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have delivered everything as promised. Slight issues with pairing but only because of an outdated phone. Sounds great and charging case is very convenient. They fit well in my ears, as well. No concerns about them falling out. I would definitely recommend these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cattoni

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding earbuds
customer_reviews.text: When I removed the charging case and earbuds from the box I was very pleasantly surprised. The charging case is constructed of metal and appears to be very durable. I have had these for a little over a month now with no problems. I workout for about an hour a day and the battery has no problems keeping up. The earbuds come with multiple parts to assure a good fit and I haven't had much trouble keeping them in my ears. I did have a bit of a problem with sound drop in the left earbud but that was corrected when I deleted the Zolo app from my phone. I don't recommend using that as it just created problems.
customer_reviews.author: Firegoogs

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed after one year
customer_reviews.text: I would have been happy with these, except that after a year of use, they've stopped holding a charge. I put them in a drawer and wrote them off a few months ago. Tried them again this morning and the battery drains after only 15 minutes, despite the earbuds showing an 80% charge. Disappointing that these are expensive, listed as the high-endurance option for Anker, and have this failure. I've tried cleaning the contacts for both the charger and the earbuds, but it's not helped. They'd otherwise be fine, but at the end of the day, if you can't walk down the street, they're not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Gasper

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud virtually inaudible after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for 18 months. Now, the left ear bud barely makes any sound, even at max volume. I can just barely make out a tiny amount of sound if I am in a quiet room. Right side still works fine for now. At this price point they should last longer than that. Probably better to go with more expensive Bose or Apple products if you can afford it, or go with cheaper ones from another manufacturer if you cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Ajo

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve ever used... period
customer_reviews.text: These really impressed me. I definitely did not expect the sound to be better than my on-ear Beats Solo2 headset’s!!! How do earbuds make such full and deep sound? I mean the sound is better than what I would expect on a headset double the price! And the music had such clarity that I was able to hear minor background details I had previously not notes!! I have not tried them yet with phone calls so I can not say about that. Also I have not had any connectivity issues. Using these with my iPhone 8, my no Bluetooth issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Petroulakis

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and sound
customer_reviews.text: These things are great right out of the box. I’ve had them for a few months now and wear them almost exclusively for the gym. Battery charge for both the container and the earbuds themselves is great. Only gripe I have is that I can’t find a combination of hooks and rubber covers that really feels sturdy in my ear. They don’t fall out, but they never feel really snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jburns

customer_reviews.title: Great wile they lasted!
customer_reviews.text: The Zolo Liberty+ Earbuds from Anker were great until now. Purchased in May of 2018 and now the Charging case no longer works so they are useless. Got a good 7 months out of them. The customer service requires you to supply the serial number that is on the cable. (So dont lose it like I did!) Then you have to return the item to them. (At least they pay for the shipping.) So just dont use these as your primary earbuds or have a spare if they become faulty like mine. I will be just buying the bose Soundsport earbuds now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey V.

customer_reviews.title: Sound was good and they do fit the ear well
customer_reviews.text: Sound was good and they do fit the ear well...BUT...no volume control on them???..which for those of us still trying to use the old BT connections on TV's without built in BT, it's a deal breaker as the volume cannot be controlled from the TV remote or the TV itself.
customer_reviews.author: Rtas47

customer_reviews.title: Sucess!
customer_reviews.text: Had many earphones over the years. Last one was apples earpods, until I lost them. Never heard of Zolo before seeing a YouTube review of it. Took and risk and bought them. They arrived today. The risk paid off big time! The box looks great. The earphone look great. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. They fit so well that they block outside noise to some degree. Connects quickly to via Bluetooth. Sounds quality excellent. Battery life looks good so far. Charging pod much larger than Apples earpod charging pod though. Most important is the sound quality, loving my music on this!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed B.

customer_reviews.title: They worked great for the first month then we both started getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for myself and my wife. They worked great for the first month then we both started getting connection issues. Sometimes it connects other times we have to fight to get them to connect. They are great for working out just wish they wouldn't drop so much depending on what you doing Update.. the company reached out to me and sent me a new pair that definitely works better. Awesome customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Dré

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and fit. TERRIBLE Call Quality. Nearly unusable
customer_reviews.text: The comfort, fit, battery life and the controls on the buds are really great! The sound quality is really solid as well. Great Highs and deep lows. The main complaint with this is that it's nearly impossible to have a phone call with these. The mics are extremely sensitive and any little sound in the background will totally overpower and drown out your voice. Beware: if you're expecting to use this to make lots of calls and talk on it frequently i would avoid. If you mainly want it to listen to music then it's highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sway

customer_reviews.title: Keep trying Anker, not there yet.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike my other pair of Liberty wireless, these lasted almost 6 months before the speakers started cutting out and I started having connection issues with the headphones. I had very high hopes for these, eapecially with the ambient feature but I was disappointed. Anker still has a way to go to start competing with the higher end wireless headphones on the market. I paid $127 for these on sale and in retrospect I should have gotten AirPods instead.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier R

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointingly short longevity
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Anker brand for a while now but this bluetooth earbuds are a big disappointment. It suffered from sporadic sudden disconnects which is very frustrating. The battery life after six month of use dwindled to about 2 hours on full charge. The charging case died after a year which made the whole thing completely useless. I don't know what's the typical longevity of a bluetooth earbuds but I can't help but to feel like it should have lasted bit more than just one year. Anker is well known for their cables and chargers but it seems like they're outside of their expertise when it comes to making audio products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Call Quality is BAD (Person on the end of the call is complaining ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for being a BT5.0. Sound quality is Okay. Call Quality is BAD (Person on the end of the call is complaining that he couldn't understand me and it's in and out when I talk. I was expecting 5.0 supposed to be a quadruple range than 4.2, but from my test, it's NOT. Returning it and getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jrbn2g

customer_reviews.title: Great paperweights
customer_reviews.text: They sounded pretty good right up tell the right side stopped working completely and all at once I purchased them sometime around Xmas it's now proximately 3 months later and they are completely useless the return and service windows in Amazon have closed so I suppose I can use them as a paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Cory Parham

customer_reviews.title: Left earphone does not work ~40% of the time
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, battery life is fantastic and build quality is pretty decent. But I've tried for two months and cannot gloss over the fact that the left earphone does not play sound close to half the time. I have to put them both back in the case and re-sync with my phone just to get sound in both earphones. This is not seamless, it is not ideal, and makes the product subpar. I wish I hadn't waited past the return date and now I'm stuck with these. Don't get them, every time I wear them I'm anxiously hoping that both will play sound, it's pretty frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Faizan Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item had really caught my attention, simply because I am a huge fan of Anker products. The ear piece sits comfortably into your ear, no complaints there. Battery life was actually pretty good for me when i worked with them they would die about 4 hours into my shift and took no time to recharge, the sound quality, honestly, surprised me nice and clear. Thanks to my children though i had to find out that with out the right ear piece you cannot sync up with the left ear piece so I'm a bit s.o.l other than that great product and keep up with those ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Darrold

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: the earphones worked well. I lost the right earbud while traveling. The left earbud does not connect without the right one. I emailed Zolo company’s customer service to see if I could purchase the right earbud. After a couple of emails back and forth, I was told they could not sell me just the right earbud. I would not recommend buying these earbuds based on the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife since she wanted one. She enjoys them everyday. I was skeptical at first until I use them. Wow, was I surprise. My wife bought me a set for christmas. Now I use mine everyday. Battery last a few days.
customer_reviews.author: ney

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they have such a small footprint with such a long battery life. Airpods always looked a little stupid to me. I have had both the Liberty Lite & Liberty+ and I have to say that the Liberty+ are a better buy. The ability to not have to worry about charging them and being able to wear them all day is definitely a huge plus. Transparency mode works as advertised and solves a major problem for me. I don't have to constantly remove the second earphone in order to hear what's going on around me which has always been a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Kai P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Sound and battery life, hinge on case needs a rework.
customer_reviews.text: Come very handy in long trips, bass is very impressive considering they are true wireless as well. The battery in the case is also great for constantly having them charged. Only problem I have is the hinge on the case seems very cheap and flimsy, other then that the case has a premium feel and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, battery lasts pretty good
customer_reviews.text: First time I used them, at soccer matches, the batteries lasted almost 7 hours. Placed back into case for about 30 min, lasted another 2 hours. Could use a smaller size to fit the ear canal though, did fall out few times.
customer_reviews.author: Frlnce

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: - The charging box is a puzzle: hard to open the charging port, hard to determine if it is fully charged/charging. - difficult to pair, inconsistent connections - do not fit the ear well , risk losing them when moving. - Having said that, once you are over the frustrations due to poor design, the sound is great... it's back to Bose...
customer_reviews.author: guglielmos.

customer_reviews.title: Battery Lasts less than 20 minutes after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the headphones for the first couple months. The sound quality was decent and they were very convenient to use. My main issue with the headphones is that the battery kept steadily declining to the point that they are unusable. The battery nowadays lasts around 20 minutes. Not enough time for a full workout. At an original price tag of $150 I expected the headphones to at least be usable for 2 years. I'm very disappointed by these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Only the right earpiece will connect. So frustrating. Do not bother buying. Customer service was also clueless on how to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: The legend

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: -Great sound quality -Connects to my phone as soon as I remove an earbud from the case. Very easy. -Long battery life for earbuds as well as the case -Feels high quality -Bluetooth quality is best I've experienced. Never skips a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Earphones
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been very satisfied. Agree with some reviews that pairing can be querky but aside from that I am pleased with them. I might also add that I would prefer a slightly tighter fit they are not loose & have never fallen out during running or gym workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, great functionality, buttons could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: These sound really great and connect easily. They also don't disconnect very often. I love them and use them all the time. I gave it four stars though because the buttons don't always work properly. Sometimes I have to hit them a few times and its hard to know when they have actually engaged or not. Also the design causes you to push the earbud further into your ear each time you press the buttons down, which is uncomfortable. Overall though I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: ashton morris

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality audio, fit my ears well, ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality audio, fit my ears well, battery seems to last long. The only thing keeping these from 5 star are that phone call audio only broadcasts over one earbud instead of both.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: buy them
customer_reviews.text: kinda wanted to give only 4⭐ because the ear inserts were very cheap and flimsy and does not seal well. then i purchased after market inserts, 👍👍. the bass heavy complaints r stupid because there's built-in sounds profile preset.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Freedom from wires
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when my 16-week-old puppy chewed up my last pair of wired earbuds. "These stay in a nice metal case," I thought. "Good luck ruining these, Lila." The case proved to be puppy-proof. Beyond that, the sound quality is excellent in this price range. The battery life is as advertised. Build quality is sturdy. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sam Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Battery degrades quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is great, the case battery works great. However, one had these for a year and the headphone batteries degrade super fast. I started out getting the rated 3.5h life. Now I'm lucky if they play for 1 hour before dying. That is incredibly bad. Don't buy these expecting them to last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: T. May

customer_reviews.title: A good try but lacking in durability
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about 2 months now and I've had to get It replaced twice and the 2nd pair one of the earphones the volume Dropped 2 nil. I was really looking forward to them as I have had excellent experiences with anker products in the past... but it seemed that while they are building towards a quality product they are not quite ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.author: donald basir

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: does have true 5.0 blue tooth so using it while watching video you do not get the lag. downloaded the app and for me personally found edm to be the best setting. Sadly I have lost them or they have been stolen so I can no longer use them. most likely will buy again but will look around to see if I have another option ( used with android)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy connection, amazing service
customer_reviews.text: Bought these the day they came out after missing out on the Kickstarter. Worked great, but had a manufacturing defect after a couple of months. Got in touch with support and they replaced the set after some minor verification of the flaws. Really happy with the customer service. In terms of the earphones, sound is excellent, very easy to connect to devices, the audio isolation toggle is pretty good actually. Overall, great purchase and outstanding service.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad for speaking to other people.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great for listening to music and the features are convenient. I dislike that phone calls only go through one side. Also, microphone placement is bad. It is great at picking up the noise around you, but the people I speak with cannot hear me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eguerrero824

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work well with my Pixel XL. There's no lag like some people are concerned about. Battery life is great. I use these when I work out and sweat doesn't seem to be a problem so far. Overall I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Cons outweigh pros
customer_reviews.text: - Audio quality is clear, but I could not detect any bass at all, even with the android app options. Would be great for audio books, but not for music. - Case is nice, but is heavier than I expected and takes a little fiddling to it open it and get the buds placed in it. - The buds fit well, stayed in place and were comfortable. - Battery life is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Don L

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty good. Leaps and bounds better than the Aairhut A2 eyebuds (I don’t recommend). Overall, great product for the price. I would recommend for anyone wanting nice wireless earbuds with good sound. They won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Crafters Delight

customer_reviews.title: Had the standard liberty and they fit like a champ in my big ass ears
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning due to the fit. Had the standard liberty and they fit like a champ in my big ass ears. For some reason the wings on the + are positioned differently and are not as secure. Aside from that the phones sounded very good and stayed connected. Bough a pair of Anker Soundcore Liberty lites instead that fit better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Zolo By Anker Headphones
customer_reviews.text: It worked about 3 days. Now it won’t turn on at all!! Don’t buy this product. Thought it was new. On the box says USED!!! 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Pluitt D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My friend has them. I haven't opened the box yet but they had great sound. They are an anker product and I love their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Heglin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working after a short period, was fine until that happened
customer_reviews.author: Robert Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Țin sound and defective volume, battery life not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slightly used from Amazon warehouse. Both buds worked ok for 30 minutes, then left bud volume went down by 80/90%. Battery was down to 70% in 15/20 minutes. Even with EQ options in app, sound is tinny compared to pixel buds and almost no bass. I thought sound quality was supposed to be great.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not the product I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, the sound is pretty good and the battery life is great, but the Bluetooth connectivity is flakey. They’re plagued with intermittent dropouts and the left bud recently stopped playing any sound at all (having worked ok for only about a month). These defects, along with a poor quality microphone and phonecall audio in only 1 ear have me looking at other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Samberg

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of true wireless ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of true wireless ear buds. Sound quality is nice, definitely has the bass that you need if you listen to a lot of house, edm, hip-hop, R&B etc. Great battery life. Blocks off most of the sound from outside. I have a bose wireless sport, but sound quality wise and sound isolation these win. Great for the gym, they didnt come off. Only thing bad would be it it's big, but for the extra battery life - i'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and battery life
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great. Much better than other wireless earbuds. The battery life is also great. One full charge on the case can last around 3 weeks of my daily usage. The only thing that I do not like about these earbuds is that they are the tips are not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: TNNT Gaming

customer_reviews.title: Right ear-bud no longer holds charge after a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in May of 2018 and the right ear bud no longer holds charge. I didn't use them all that much. The noise cancelling and sound was quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Volodesi

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected until they didn't... but were replaced
customer_reviews.text: These worked for me for a little over a year of heavy use. Then the battery life nose dived. I called them and they sent me a new pair. That's pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST truly wireless earbuds available.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Great sound quality, great for and great battery life. They work well in all conditions - even crowded subway trains and platforms where other Bluetooth headphones cut out or perform poorly. Excellent app and support fill out a super value. The BEST truly wireless headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: jamesjhare

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great until right earbud went out 6 months after purchase. I used them almost daily to listen to music or podcasts. It makes me sad they lasted 6 months and then quit.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Evans

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, not from certified retailer so I got jipped.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, not from a certified retailer so I got jipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, long battery life, good features. Ive had them for about 3 weeks and there great ive had to recharge the docking box 2 times and charged the earbuds more than a few times ive had no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Vulcan rider

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like these, I really did. I read reviews and was convinced these were the best truly wireless earbuds. However I never was able to get a truly comfortable fit. The worse part, I kept having random issues with audio cutting out. It was incredibly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Change the inner ear rubber to hook on your inner ear for a small hanger to hook inside your ear.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the rubber part that comes with the earpods they should come with the little hanger to put on your inner ear to hold it. The reason I say that is because it hurts my ears inside. That is the only complaint about it but It works great and the case to charge it is wonderful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud problem
customer_reviews.text: Left ear bud keeps dropping connection/doesn't connect at all and then I have to fully reconnect both of them. It is also hard to get them to fit in properly. Personally I feel these are not"it" and you can definitely find better ones for the same price or even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Yogesh K.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and company
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with them, only hiccup is that after a few months the battery life started to dwindle on one of the buds and I didn't want to use only one at a time. Company replaced them since still under warranty and now happily using replacement pair. Happy to continue to use their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto A. Mendiburu

customer_reviews.title: Not as much bass as I would like and the high end is tinny and start to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as much bass as I would like and the high end is tinny and start to hurt my ears after awhile. Had to turn up bass and down the high end. After wearing to the gym for about 2 weeks the rubber sleeve started to strecltxh and come off. Not worth the money. Also have frequent cutting out when my phone Galaxy 9+ is in my pocket. Already replaced them with the Bose. Night and day difference. The Bose are worth the extra money. Better sound and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bechtold

customer_reviews.title: Switch broke in 45 Days
customer_reviews.text: Performance was good. The ergonomic fit to your ear was ok. The problem was the button to select features became stuck depressed after maybe 12 uses or 3--50 depresses. They/amazon would not send a replacement so I had to get a refund AFTER paying "restocking fee"!! Poor Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Ward G

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but a bit bass heavy and tons of different ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound good but a bit bass heavy and tons of different size options in the box. Charger case is the right size and doesn't feel bulky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Charge
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these just over 1 month and they don’t seem to want to charge anymore. I’m not sure what happened. They were fine before. I keep plugging the case in and nothing happens. Even when I leave them plugged in all night.
customer_reviews.author: EXMan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. They fit nicely in my ear and the sound is perfect for what I need, primarily listening to audiobooks. If music is your thing then you may not be happy with the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a few wireless earbuds, these by far are the best! Great sound, good fit and fantastic battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good. If you have a Apple Watch and iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. If you have a Apple Watch and iPhone you have to manually hook it up every time you want to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Recently got these earbuds, they work pretty well. Watched some videos on YouTube without any delays. Though these fit my left ear more than right ear, the right earbud sometimes would fall out which is quite annoying. Still pretty nice pair of wireless earbuds at the price!
customer_reviews.author: YuTing Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Sound levels are lower in left ear
customer_reviews.text: After about 1 month of use the sound level in the left ear bud simply would not increase past a certain point. I stopped using them. If you want a pair I'll sell mine!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Zolo Liberty + Kick A**
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. I’ve waiting for it since the first preview but missed out on the kick starter. Anyway, was hoping the sound could be better. It’s my very first wireless earphones and I will definitely recommend anyone to get a pair. ^\^
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort. I like how far the Bluetooth signal reaches. I like them a lot. I love being able to gear other outside noises.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley F Young

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not very good
customer_reviews.text: The volume goes super low sometime other times it’s super loud and The battery life is not very good either I have to change them everyday after only using them for 45mins to 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: Harderp Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: More life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound wish it had more power life to it at least 20-24 hr for the amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: D,Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great support
customer_reviews.text: The product is superior! I have a few issues with the first unit and their support team headed by Anny did a marvelous job in keeping me happy. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: When I got my product my box was so damaged up I don't even know if the Zolo bugs work so what's that check them I will write you back because I'm not preciate it behind the box came
customer_reviews.author: demetria washington

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones. Sound is great and have not had ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones. Sound is great and have not had any issues in the two weeks that I have been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Agopian

customer_reviews.title: Not great sound
customer_reviews.text: I liked them until a month in and the left earbud stopped working completely theres no sound coming out but i can still use it to control my music and open and close siri i just cant hear anything
customer_reviews.author: carol lacour

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for only a few months and already one of them doesn’t work. I would not recommend. Plus they’re pretty large.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them!
customer_reviews.text: They were too expensive to only have one of the ear buds to go out! I work 3rd shift and I kept forgetting to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Buy the upgraded model.
customer_reviews.text: They don't last for more than a year. Mine are trash now, they don't fully charge and they don't last for more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: David Randell

customer_reviews.title: good sound and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good sound and connectivity. Telephone features need improvement, specifically the fact that sound is terrible (recipients of calls complain they can nearly hear me) and sound can only be heard in mono!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Are you sure you want these headphones?
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the build Liked the battery life on the entrie unit It did say in my ear decently well Sound was decent, expected more
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: They were a good set of ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: They lights on the front pf the case stopped working. The battery on the buds die in 15 mins tops. And I just got them in may
customer_reviews.author: Demetra W.

customer_reviews.title: This is the One to order!
customer_reviews.text: These Are the best ear pieces I have used. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jed Simi

customer_reviews.title: Left bud didn’t work don’t waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: Garbage item left bud didn’t even connect at all ... so bad returned and never coming back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stay away !!!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair i had a problem with one of the buttons not working they send me a second pair out of the box the buds would randomly . the third pair the left ear bud was extremely low volume out of the box . please stay away from these bud . also every pair i received had a different sound profile
customer_reviews.author: HHACKER

customer_reviews.title: Apple are pods are better
customer_reviews.text: Controls are Really trashly colded It’s a pain to connect and control it
customer_reviews.author: henrique

customer_reviews.title: Way better than AirPods.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever had. AirPods wouldn’t stay in ear and sound quality was lacking. These work great for me and have never gone dead.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Got six months out of them
customer_reviews.text: Six months in and the left bud will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE OFF THE CHAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got theses for my son and he loves them. Uses them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, quick charging the buds in the case, case charge is good for a couple days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Zolo Liberty+ Total-Wireless Earphones, Bluetooth Earbuds with Graphene Driver Technology and 48 Hours Battery Life, Sweatproof Total-Wireless Earbuds with Smart AI and Toggle Sound Isolation
product_meta.description: Cut The Cord With no cords or wires to tie you down, Total-Wireless Earphones will change the way you listen to music forever. Take your workout to the next level and or escape from the boredom of your commute. Immersive Sound Precision oscillation for superior sound is produced by Liberty's carefully designed graphene-coated drivers. With their rigid yet extremely light construction, the drivers effectively boost treble and clarity for breathtaking audio. Long-Lasting Battery 3. 5 hours of playtime is boosted by the powerful charging case for an incredible 48 hours of play time. Power your commute for a week without needing to bring a charging cable with you. Instant Connection PUSH AND GO makes connecting your devices easy-simply take Liberty out of the charging case and connect via your phone's Bluetooth menu. After the initial setup Liberty automatically connects when removed from the case and disconnects when returned. One Tap Activation Just one tap toggles sound isolation for better awareness or activates your favorite AI Assistant. Liberty's microphones are optimized for voice recognition, so you'll get the answers you need, fast. Find Your Perfect Fit Grip Fit technology ensures Liberty fits comfortably, yet securely in your ear. Simply slide in and turn to lock. Your earphones are personalized further with the addition of silky smooth liquid silicon Ear Tips and Grip Jackets in multiple sizes.
feature_bullets: No cables, No limits flagship Total-Wireless earphones with revolutionary graphene-augmented drivers, adjustable ambient sound levels, and extended battery life.
Graphene-powered sound pioneering audio technology delivers jaw-dropping clarity and treble. A sound-tight seal generates deep bass with exceptional isolation.
48 hours of power Get 3. 5 hours of playtime from a single charge then Boost that to 48 with the included charging case.
Smart to use push and go ensures ultra-fast pairing between devices, while a simple tap activates your smart ai or toggles sound isolation to keep you aware of your surroundings.
What you get Liberty+ Total-Wireless earphones, Liberty+ charging case, 4 x grip fit Jackets, 3 x Ear tips and micro-USB cable.

specifications.Included Components: Bluetooth headphones, Charging case, Travel pouch, Manual
